title: Lady Gaga jokes over body X-ray as fan speaks out after Vegas fall
text:
Lady Gaga has joked she’s had to X-ray her entire body after Vegas stage fall (Picture: @DiamondDelGagas/Twitter/Lady Gaga/Instagram)

Lady Gaga has joked she’s had to X-ray her entire body after suffering a nasty fall off stage during one of her Las Vegas shows.

Gaga was dancing with a fan on stage, after inviting them up to join her to mark the return of her Vegas residency.

She had wrapped her legs around his waist, but he accidentally lost his footing and sent the pair brutally crashing down into the pit below, with the fan accidentally landing on top of poor Gaga.

Footage of the fall was caught on camera and if that wasn’t proof alone that it had been pretty rough, Gaga took to Instagram to joke she’s had to have her entire body X-rayed.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Sharing a mock X-ray of a hand making an OK sign, she wrote: ‘When they have to X-Ray almost your entire body…Just Dance. Gonna be ok.’

And while Gaga seems to be brushing off the mishap, the fan in question is urging people to stop blaming him for hurting the Shallow singer.

Taking to Twitter, the fan who goes by the handle @jackandrewx, wrote: ‘for people dm’ing me, i’ll say it again…THE FALL WAS NEITHER MINE NOR GAGA’S FAULT. It was an accident, please stop.’

He attempted to clear up the confusion about the incident and explained he lost his footing, as the stage had been wet.

Explaining that Gaga had jumped on him, Jack wrote: ‘My foot slipped. As we fell, I tried to make sure I took the brunt of the fall and if you could see my leg, you’d see that I kinda did.’

‘Lady Gaga herself has told people to stop with the negative comments,’ he claimed. ‘After the show Lady Gaga herself personally sent her security to come and find me so we could meet and chat and she told me herself I was not to blame and so did multiple members of [her] team.’

He finished by pointing out: ‘I WASN’T DRUNK OR ANYTHING ELSE PEOPLE ARE ACCUSING ME OF.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I WASN’T ANYTHING BUT IN AWE OF HER.

description: Lady Gaga and a fan fell off stage during her Vegas residency show comeback.
